member.name: T:MotorBD
member.summary: A set of quick methods for a motors connected to ports A and B.

member.name: M:Off
member.summary: Stop motor ports BD. This will also cancel any scheduled movement for this motors. Motors will continue to rotate by inertia

member.name: M:OffAndBrake
member.summary: Stop motors port BD. This will also cancel any scheduled movement for this motors. Motors will stop completely

member.name: M:SetSpeed
member.summary: Set motors speed to port BD.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:SetPower
member.summary: Set motors power to ports BD.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:StartSpeed
member.summary: Set motors speed to ports BD, then start motors.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:StartPower
member.summary: Set motors power to ports BD, then start motors.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)
